api_key.description: Please enter your Freshdesk API key. You can find it in the profile section page.

sub_domain.description: Please enter your Freshdesk sub-domain. It's in the URL, the name which appears before (.freshdesk.com) in the URL. For ex: In `xyz.freshdesk.com`, `xyz` is the subdomain

accessKeyId.description: Enter the AWS access key id

secretAccessKey.description: Enter the AWS secret access key
